14.ara-name: كتاب البيوع عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas bin Malik: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) cursed ten involved in wine: The one who presses it, the one who has it pressed, its drinker, its carrier, and the one it is carried to, its server, its seller, the consumption of its price, the one who purchases it and the one it was purchased for." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib as a narration of Anas. Similar to this has been reported from Ibn 'Abbas, Ibn Mas'ud, and Ibn 'Umar, from the Prophet (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ أَنْ يُتَّخَذَ الْخَمْرُ خَلاًّ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition To Use Wine To Make Vinegar
